query: SELECT id, intakeId, runPlanId, runId, status, JSON_PRETTY(data) as data_pretty FROM ship_packets WHERE id = 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2E4HaJUB1R41J12.fcd4ff42607d --database H86jcAdP392wwbWXRcEDMs --execute SELECT id, intakeId, runPlanId, runId, status, JSON_PRETTY(data) as data_pretty FROM ship_packets WHERE id = 5;
messages: "rationale": "Enhances readability and comfort, making the interface feel safe and operational.",
"value": "Set a neutral color palette with a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 for body text to ensur..."
"rationale": "Encourages a sense of safety and approachability in the interface.",

"rationale": "Enhances the visual hierarchy and makes information easier to digest.",
"value": "Use 20px spacing between cards and 16px padding within cards to create a less dense, more ..."

"rationale": "Provides visible trust signals without being intrusive, enhancing a sense of safety.",

"rationale": "Creates a calm flow between sections while maintaining a premium look.",

"description": "Hero CTA clarity compromised by dual CTAs without clear hierarchy or purpose differentiation",
"rationale": "Two CTAs create decision paralysis; unclear why user would choose 'view pricing' over primary action",
"description": "Mobile hero stacking not specified - critical for above-fold comprehension on primary device",
"rationale": "60/40 desktop grid needs mobile treatment; poor stacking kills 8-second comprehension test",
"description": "Sticky CTA appears too late at 40% scroll - conversion opportunities lost in first screens",
"rationale": "Users decide to convert within first 20% of page; 40% trigger misses early decision moments",
"description": "Audit log pattern lacks mobile optimization - table format will break on small screens",
"rationale": "Tables are notoriously difficult on mobile; trust feature becomes unusable on primary device",
"description": "Section reordering buries pricing too deep - removes price anchoring from early consideration",
"rationale": "Pricing moved after How It Works delays value assessment; users need cost context earlier",
"description": "3-tier pricing cards lack mobile stacking specification - comparison becomes impossible",
"rationale": "Card layouts need explicit mobile behavior; horizontal scrolling kills pricing comprehension",
"description": "Timeline layout undefined for mobile - horizontal becomes unusable without vertical fallback",
"rationale": "Horizontal timelines break on mobile; vertical stacking behavior not specified",
"description": "65ch line length may be excessive on large screens - reduces readability at wide viewports",
"rationale": "Optimal reading is 45-75ch; 65ch approaches upper limit and may strain comprehension",
"description": "Card spacing of 20px may create excessive white space density on mobile viewports",
"rationale": "20px gaps consume precious mobile real estate; may push content below fold unnecessarily",
"description": "Proof bar placement lacks mobile behavior specification - chips may overflow or stack poorly",
"rationale": "Proof chips need responsive behavior; poor mobile treatment undermines trust signals",
"fix": "Use single primary CTA 'Call Now' with 48px height, secondary link 'See Pricing' as 14px text link below",
"rationale": "Creates clear hierarchy while maintaining secondary path without visual competition",
"fix": "Stack hero vertically on <768px: H1 + bullets + CTA in single column with 24px spacing between elements",
"rationale": "Ensures mobile comprehension within 8 seconds by prioritizing scannable vertical flow",
"fix": "Trigger sticky CTA at 20% scroll with 56px height bar containing primary CTA and phone number",
"rationale": "Captures early conversion intent while maintaining contact accessibility throughout scroll",
"fix": "Use card-based log entries on mobile: 4px left border, timestamp + action in stacked text, 12px padding",
"rationale": "Maintains audit log trust value while ensuring mobile usability through card-based layout",
"fix": "Reorder to: Hero → Proof → Quick Pricing Preview → Problem/Solution → How It Works → Full Pricing",
"rationale": "Provides early price anchoring while maintaining narrative flow and trust building",
"fix": "Use single-column stacked cards on mobile with 16px spacing, highlight recommended option with border",
"rationale": "Ensures pricing comparison works on mobile while maintaining clear recommendation hierarchy",
"fix": "Use vertical numbered cards on mobile: step number in 32px circle, title + description in stack",
"rationale": "Maintains process clarity while adapting to mobile constraints through vertical progression",
"fix": "Set max-width to 55ch for body text with 1.6 line-height for optimal readability across devices",
"rationale": "Improves reading comfort while maintaining good text density and comprehension speed",
"fix": "Use 16px spacing on mobile, 20px on desktop with breakpoint at 768px for responsive density",
"rationale": "Optimizes mobile real estate while maintaining desktop breathing room and visual hierarchy",
"fix": "Horizontal scroll chips on mobile with snap-scroll, 2-3 visible at once, 12px gap between chips",
"rationale": "Maintains proof visibility while handling overflow gracefully through intuitive scroll behavior",
"rationale": "Improves above-the-fold clarity and makes the “hand it off without losing control” promise...",

"rationale": "Moves trust and observability earlier (as auditability), improves narrative flow, and ensu...",

"rationale": "Reduces decision fatigue and creates a clear conversion path without relying on excessive ...",
"value": "Use a single primary CTA (Call) and one secondary CTA (e.g., view pricing/see process) in ..."
"rationale": "Clarifies the operating model quickly and provides a natural mid-funnel conversion moment.",

"rationale": "Cuts cognitive load and makes the value proposition scannable without adding new claims.",
